mission.title: Iṣẹ Wa
mission.content: A gbagbọ ninu agbara ariyanjiyan lati yi awọn igbesi aye ati awọn agbegbe pada ni agbaye.

team.title: Ẹgbẹ Wa
team.description: Pade awọn eniyan ti o ni itara lẹhin Ziggy

values.title: Awọn Iye Wa
values.excellenceDesc: A n tiraka fun didara ni gbogbo ohun ti a ṣe
values.communityDesc: Kiko awọn asopọ kọja awọn aala

contact.title: Kan si Wa
contact.description: A yoo fẹran lati gbọ lati ọdọ rẹ
